attributes.action: enact a bill to add a deposit to glass and plastic bottles to help increase the level of recycling of these items similar to the USA and Germany
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the USA and Germany the level of recycling of bottles of the glass and plastic variety has dramatically increased after a resonable level of deposit was placed on these items. All shops must recycle the bottles and return deposits no matter who sold the original item. This includes soft drinks bottles, beer bottles and more.

This idea is similar to the EC directive to force the recycling of electrical goods.
